sentences.english: During the reign of Emperor Taizong there was a minister named Wei Zheng.

sentences.english: Thereupon the emperor hid the young falcon inside his sleeve, thinking to quickly send Weizheng off on some pretext.

Since Wei Zheng was gone, I have lost one mirror ever since.
